doc:
Ernest Chappell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernest_Chappell 0 Ernest E. Chappell (June 10, 1903 - July 4, 1983) was an American radio announcer and actor, best remembered for his featured role in the late 1940s radio program Quiet, Please. The show ran from 1947 to 1949, and Quiet, Please was Chappell's major acting credit. His signature line was: "And so, until next week at this same time, I am quietly yours, Ernest Chappell." Ernest_E._Chappell ( June_10_,_1903 - July_4_,_1983 ) was an_American_radio_announcer_and_actor , best remembered for his_featured_role in the_late_1940s_radio_program_Quiet , Please . The_show ran from 1947 to 1949 , and Quiet , Please was Chappell 's_major_acting_credit . His_signature_line was : " And so , until next_week at this_same_time , I am_quietly_yours , Ernest_Chappell .
